author: alexandair
body:
Fix typos and casing.
"on Linux PowerShell" change to "in PowerShell on Linux".
Apply "one-sentence-per-line" rule.

comments.author: alexandair
comments.body:
@andschwa Please, review.
"Linux PowerShell" was in line 144. :)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Oh that's what you meant. I thought you were trying to point out a "Linujx" typo.

title: fix typos and casing in KNOWNISSUES.md
